title: Snapped: The Murder of Gucci
description:
Wealth, power and murdering your ex-husband. Just a few of Patrizia Reggiani’s favorite things. Ex-wife of Maurizio Gucci, heir to the Gucci empire, hired a hitman to kill Maurizio after he left her for a younger woman. Join us as we break down her infamous murder trial and its aftermath.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
